column1: #Text=Aang says : " We 're going to run out of light any second now , are n't we ? "
#Text=Katara says : " I think so ... " Aang says : " Then , what are we going to do ? "
#Text=" Chong says : " Hey , those things are music lovers !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Badgermoles coming toward me .
#Text=" Chong says : " The big , bad badgermoles who earthbend the tunnels , hate the wolfbats , but love the sounds !
